content: Investments Maybank Kim Eng Asked by AnonymousAsked on 29 May 2019Maybank Kim Eng is stopping Monthly Investment Plan(MIP). Thoughts?2 answersAnswerBump3
Answers (2)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Jonathan Chia Guangrong, Fund Manager at JCG FundLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 31 May 2019Hate to see it go. Like that it offers a myraid of different stocks at a low commission rate. Will probably wait for something similar to come up before I start RSP again. Hoard the cash in the meantime0 comments0

Vincent Tan Wen Bin, Assistant Vice President at Thinkers AllianceLevel 5. GeniusAnswered on 31 May 2019Just move on to the next brokerage. There are many brokerages out there that offer RSP. Even banks do offer it as well. OCBC BCIP (Blue Chip Investment Program)0 comments0
